alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 1:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida and southern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/... At 157 PM EDT/1257 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Blountstown, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange, Bristol, East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Vilas, Jensen Place, Central City, Red Hill, Clio, Owens Bridge, Estiffanulga, Kern, Wilma, Lewis, Woods, Nixon Garden and Twin Pole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
